itemDescription: British peer, soldier and politician of the Conservative Party (1922-2011)

wikipedia_page.main: Anthony Philip Harbord-Hamond, 11th Baron Suffield, MC (19 June 1922 – 8 December 2011), was a British peer, soldier and politician of the Conservative Party.

response: **Anthony Harbord-Hamond, 11th Baron Suffield, peer, soldier and politician (b. 1922)
*Anthony Harbord-Hamond, 11th Baron Suffield, 89, British soldier and aristocrat.
